introduce.title: What is TwitterDown
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: TwitterDown is a powerful tool that lets you download any Twitter video in high quality. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and casual users.

benefit.description: TwitterDown offers the fastest and most reliable way to download Twitter videos with features designed for both casual users and professionals.

items.description: Download videos in MP4, WebM, or GIF format to suit your specific needs and use cases.

items.title: Batch Processing

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use TwitterDown
usage.description: Download any Twitter video in three simple steps:

items.title: Copy the URL
items.description: Find the Twitter video you want to download and copy its URL from the address bar or share menu.

items.title: Paste & Process
items.description: Paste the URL into TwitterDown and click the process button. Our system will analyze the video.

items.title: Download
items.description: Choose your preferred quality and format, then click download. The video will be saved to your device.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of TwitterDown
feature.description: Everything you need to download and manage Twitter videos efficiently.

items.title: High-Speed Downloads
items.description: Our optimized servers ensure the fastest possible download speeds for all videos.

items.title: Quality Selection
items.description: Choose between different quality options to balance file size and video quality.

items.title: Audio Extraction
items.description: Extract audio tracks from Twitter videos and save them as MP3 files.

items.title: Spaces Recording Downloads
items.description: Download Twitter Spaces recordings for offline listening and archiving.

items.title: Video Trimming
items.description: Premium users can trim videos before downloading to get exactly what they need.

items.title: Download History
items.description: Keep track of your downloaded videos with a convenient history feature.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team for assistance.

items.title: Is it legal to download Twitter videos?
items.description: TwitterDown is designed for personal use. While downloading videos for personal viewing is generally acceptable, please respect copyright laws and the original creator's rights. Do not republish or monetize content without proper permission.

items.title: Do I need a Twitter account to use TwitterDown?
items.description: No, you don't need a Twitter account to use TwitterDown. Simply copy the URL of the video you want to download and paste it into our tool.

items.title: What video formats does TwitterDown support?
items.description: Our free plan supports MP4 downloads. Pro and Business plans offer additional formats including WebM and GIF, as well as MP3 audio extraction.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many videos I can download?
items.description: Free users can download up to 5 videos per day. Pro and Business users enjoy unlimited downloads with no daily restrictions.

items.title: Can I download private Twitter videos?
items.description: No, TwitterDown can only download publicly available videos. Videos from private accounts or direct messages cannot be accessed.

items.title: How do I use the browser extension?
items.description: After installing our browser extension (available for Pro and Business users), you'll see a download button appear when you hover over Twitter videos. Click it to download directly without leaving Twitter.
